title: Ayurvedic Health Care | YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts | Health Resort near NYC
description: Ayurvedic Health Care Treatment at YO1 - Ayurvedic treatment is for the healthy as well as for the diseased in order to eliminate toxins from the body. At our health resort in Catskills NYC, treat yourself to a rejuvenating and unforgettable stay.
